name: Anatase TiO2 HTA-201
description: Anatase TiO2 HTA-201 is a kind of white pharmaceutical pigment, food additive, and edible pigment. After further processed from crude product, this product is of good pigment properties, and meets the requirements of United States Pharmacopeias and European Pharmacopeias on harmful impurity contents. Also suitable for pharmaceutical opaque capsule, film coating of tablets, cream, pharmaceutical package material, pharmaceutical printing ink, cosmetic additives, white food additives, electronic industry, and ceramic industry.
